comment: /**  * Line number of the location of the error  *  * @return the line number or -1 if unknown  */
code: /**  * Line number of the location of the error  *  * @return the line number or -1 if unknown  */ public int getLineNumber() {     return lineNumber. }

comment: /**  * Column number of the location of the error  *  * @return the column number or -1 if unknown  */
code: /**  * Column number of the location of the error  *  * @return the column number or -1 if unknown  */ public int getColumnNumber() {     return columnNumber. }

@Override protected void metadataToXContent(XContentBuilder builder, Params params) throws IOException {     if (lineNumber != UNKNOWN_POSITION) {         builder.field("line", lineNumber).         builder.field("col", columnNumber).     } }
@Override public void writeTo(StreamOutput out) throws IOException {     super.writeTo(out).     out.writeInt(lineNumber).     out.writeInt(columnNumber). }
